title.rendered: INTECH becomes part of monumental low-carbon push; wins the complete automation scope for the largest Direct Air Capture plant in history

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

INTECH’s Houston Center of Excellence for Energy Transition caps off FY 22-23 with landmark project as it extends run of project wins in the American Renewable & Green Energy sector.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]INTECH has won the automation scope for the largest Direct Air Capture plant in the Permian Basin, Texas, continuing to play its part in a historic drive to reduce atmospheric CO2 concentration levels as the DAC plant aims at removing one million metric tons of atmospheric CO2 annually.

With this groundbreaking project, INTECH aims to leverage its extensive automation expertise to help address the monumental challenge of the energy transition.

INTECH’s multi-disciplinary automation team will equip multiple trains, process units, and utilities units throughout the plant with high performance process & safety control systems and SCADA, combining performance-proven control technology with real-time supervisory control for maximizing uptime and asset productivity while reducing total cost of ownership.

This development comes at an opportune time as the company carries on its momentum of project wins in the American Renewable & Green energy sector; including control & safety automation project for a major biomass facility in Alabama, break-through MAC-scope win at a green hydrogen plant in California, providing a leak detection system for safer natural gas transportation in Louisiana, and winning the complete automation scope for a water treatment facility of a semi-conductor manufacturing plant in Texas.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

“Everyone at INTECH is excited to support such a momentous project. Given INTECH’s deep expertise in traditional energy, we are uniquely poised to help our customers take on the challenge of achieving a sustainable energy transition. We look forward to partnering with our customer to deliver a successful project for them and the world”

          – Ahsan Sohail, President[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Ahsan Sohail, INTECH’s President had this to say – “Everyone at INTECH is excited to support such a momentous project. Given INTECH’s deep expertise in traditional energy, we are uniquely poised to help our customers take on the challenge of achieving a sustainable energy transition. We look forward to partnering with our customer to deliver a successful project for them and the world.”

About INTECH’s Integrated Control Systems (ICS) Solutions

INTECH’s Integrated Control Systems offer a complete array of vendor-neutral control automation and integration solutions ranging from basic Process Control, Safety, F&G, and Power Management applications to data networks, site security, instrument management, and fully integrated control and safety systems. Our third-party start-up and commissioning services ensure minimum downtime and accelerated glitch-free execution. INTECH’s ICS is a “One-Stop Automation Solution” that improves plant safety, reliability, and efficiency while lowering costs and increasing returns.

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/automation/integrated-control-systems/

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
